title: Postit Note
description: A yellow sticky, just like the ones you used back home.
data: The experiment is proceeding as expected. The world will tremble when they discover that I've done.
secretData: The black light reveals the following characters: mcpr%o^Xt9JZ3w!D70. It might be a password.

title: Email
data: I see that the email was sent to the victim just hours before he died.
secretData:
Subject: never again
 
I've put up with your actions for far too long. I won't let you hurt me again. This will end... one way or another.

title: Log file
data: These are the terminal access and command files for the last 2 days.
secretData: There is nothing out of the ordinary in these log files.
